reportJson.assessmentNo: Old Assessment No. 569, New Assessment No. 198270000544

sections.content:
The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 41 of 2026, dated 12/Jan/2026, executed by Edika Murali in favour of his Wife, Edika Ramathulasamma towards the property admeasuring an extent of 106 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 6/92, Old Assessment No. 569, New Assessment No. 198270000544, comprised in survey number 126, situated in Mylapalle Village & Garma Panchayati, Chitvel Mandal, within the District of Annamayya, registered at sub-registrar office Chitvel, is bounded as follows:

North by: Site Of Donor
South by: Site of Pandikalla Narasamma
East by: House Of Ymikka Lakshumma
West by: Panchayathi Road
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed

Note: It is noted that the Survey Number is handwritten in the Deed and hence the same may be verified by obtaining a Certified Copy from the concerned SRO, before proceeding to the loan process. Therefore, it is advisable for the F.I. to verify the same and proceed as per its internal policy. Further It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
